name: Dyschronometria I
description: Established techniques of long exposure photography involve a fixed camera position. Reverse light painting is a new method I developed, where the camera is put in motion to draw with the light of the sun, cities, or stars, unlocking new viewpoints and bending the elusive fourth dimension. This is the first NFT to be sold that features this new technique.  A portion of this sale will be donated to the Mojave Desert Land Trust conservation project.  3840x2560, Sixty Seconds, 172MB
